mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.PARENT_ID, A.PATH, A.SORT_NO, A.IS_DIR , GROUP_CONCAT(B.ID ORDER BY B.SORT_NO) AS CHILD_MENU_ID , COUNT(DISTINCT C.ID) AS SUB_CNT FROM admin_menu A LEFT OUTER JOIN admin_menu B ON A.ID = B.PARENT_ID AND B.IS_DIR = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN admin_menu C ON A.ID = C.PARENT_ID AND C.IS_DIR = 'N' WHERE A.IS_DIR = 'Y' GROUP BY A.ID, A.NAME, A.PARENT_ID, A.PATH, A.SORT_NO, A.IS_DIR ORDER BY A.ID
SELECT A.ID, A.NAME, A.PARENT_ID, A.PATH, A.SORT_NO, A.IS_DIR FROM admin_menu A WHERE A.PARENT_ID = #{id} AND A.IS_DIR = 'N' ORDER BY A.ID
SELECT ID, NAME, PARENT_ID, CATEGORY, PATH, IS_DIR, SORT_NO, CREATED_DT FROM admin_menu WHERE CATEGORY = 'Joplin'
